quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Opportunities multiply as they are seized.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: All warfare is based on deception.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Engage people with what they expect; it is what they are able to discern and confirms their projections.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Know yourself and you will win all battles.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Build your opponent a golden bridge to retreat across.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The greatest victory is that which requires no battle.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: He who knows when he can fight and when he cannot, will be victorious.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Management of many is the same as management of few. It is a matter of organization.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Treat your men as you would your own beloved sons. And they will follow you into the deepest valley.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The wise warrior avoids the battle.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Ponder and deliberate before you make a move.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Move swift as the Wind and closely-formed as the Wood. Attack like the Fire and be still as the Mountain.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: It is more important to outthink your enemy than to outfight him.
author: Sun Tzu
